timelineItems.text: Conor Casey exists to school young American defenders. Shane O'Neill last week, Miazga this week.

timelineItems.text: 14' Henry's trickery at the top of the box is quickly stopped by Union pressure. #DOOP #PHIvNY

timelineItems.name: Jacob Martella
timelineItems.text: 15': Actually exciting end-to-end stuff here to start the match. Philly has had the better chances thus far. 1-0 #PHI. #PHIvNY #MLS

timelineItems.text: #DOOP passing is taking the young #RBNY back line out of position and trying to get Olave out of the box. Good strategy. #PHIvNY

timelineItems.text: Lot of frustrated gestures early on from #RBNY players, who aren't on the same page right now. Union defense still looks a bit shaky, though

timelineItems.desc: Philadelphia Union will be looking to return to their winning ways in a crucial match in the Eastern Conference when they play host to the New York Red Bulls at PPL Park.

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: I know I am in the minority here but once again, feel Olave is a bit off since returning from the WC break. #RBNY #PHIvNY

timelineItems.name: Phillip O'Neal
timelineItems.text: The Red Bulls need to stop playing from behind and get it together. #PHIvNY #MLS

timelineItems.name: Glenn Williams
timelineItems.text: Every single pass, tackle, shot, movement and decision has been the wrong choice tonight. #RBNY playing like strangers. No cohesion.

timelineItems.name: Steve Hoffman
timelineItems.text: 75% of the #RBNY back line = rookies. Showing tonight.

timelineItems.name: Glenn Williams
timelineItems.text: Dax is back and his passing hasn't improved a single bit. Does nothing creatively. Not good enough for a CM. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Great defense by Baldomero Toledo on Henry #PHIvNY #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Genele Streitz
timelineItems.text: No matter how his team plays, Mike Petke always looks good. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Soccer Doctor
timelineItems.text: Hope coach Henry gives a rousing halftime speech #RBNY

timelineItems.name: filipe rufino
timelineItems.text: Henry is much more a playmaker than a striker at #RBNY. Cahill infiltrates all the time to try a headed. Philadelphia Union leads: 1-0.

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: HT. Union 1, #RBNY 0. Casey punishes Red Bulls with early goal to put hosts out in front. Philly D stepped up, but Red Bulls sloppy. #PHIvNY

timelineItems.name: Mike
timelineItems.text: #DOOP has Oyongo further up the field than Henry for large parts of the game. They're dictating play. #PHIvNY #RBNY

timelineItems.text: Goal Fred! What a touch by Casey. Robles got a piece of it, but it's 2-0. #RBNY #DOOP #PHIvNY

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: #RBNY are winless when they let up the first goal. That streak looks as healthy as it has been all season. #DOOP #PHIvNY

timelineItems.text: It's a goalfest at PPL Park. @PhilaUnion with the 3-1 advantage with 10 minutes to go: http://t.co/qhW0v1cXJV #PHIvNY http://t.co/LZ3jR2d1sF

timelineItems.name: Glenn Williams
timelineItems.text: Too many players in this #RBNY team have been getting away with bad habit mistakes for too long. That falls on @petkemike.

timelineItems.name: scubastevegk
timelineItems.text: It's a wonderful sight when Henry has to come back 75 yards to receive the ball #DOOP #PHIvNY

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Fred (Philadelphia Union).
Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Ambroise Oyongo Bitolo (New York Red Bulls).
Sheanon Williams (Philadelphia Union) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Manav Khandelwal
timelineItems.text: Aaron Wheeler in for Conor Casey. A little puzzling with Brian Brown still on the bench. #Union #DOOP

timelineItems.desc: Matt Miazga (New York Red Bulls) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Matt Miazga chops down Wheeler from behind

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 3 - Philadelphia have been issued three red cards in their last two #MLS games. Worrisome. #PHIvNY

timelineItems.name: Jeannette Robinson
timelineItems.text: Yay at the @philaunion game!!! Lets go boys in blue!!! #philadelphia #union #boysinblue #DOOP #fanofthegame

timelineItems.text: Just enjoying the view of the field :) @hockeyguy3389 #union #doop

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Bobby Convey coming on for McCarty. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: lauren
timelineItems.text: a beautiful night a ppl ! #nofilter #ppl #union #doop #philadelphia #phillyu #soccer #mls #espn #pplpark

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Isaac
timelineItems.text: Convey is coming! We're saved! #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Convey in for McCarty, who looks justifiably gassed. Another big opportunity for the veteran to make his mark with #RBNY #PHIvNY

timelineItems.name: Teshawn Edmonds
timelineItems.text: Attendance at @PPLPark: 18,541 #PHIvNY

timelineItems.name: Pardeep Cattry
timelineItems.text: Petke making first subs late into the match is bringing back flashbacks to Hans Backe. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: RBNYTweets (Matt)
timelineItems.text: I couldn't even figure out how to do that move @ThierryHenry just did in @EASPORTSFIFA #RBNY

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the top right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Zac MacMath smacks away a point-blank shot by Lloyd Sam

timelineItems.name: Jake Oliver
timelineItems.text: Henry showboating 6min into a derby, with the score still nil-nil. Love it #RBNY

timelineItems.name: MLS - Ao Vivo
timelineItems.text: 8' - GOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOL @PhilaUnion! #PHIvNY #MLS

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Twellman on #RBNY missing Holgersson: "I think he was an underrated defender" #PREACH #PHIvNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Bobby Convey.

timelineItems.name: soccersource
timelineItems.text: Pretty lackluster performance by #RBNY overall. Defense very worrisome. Miazga may need to sit for a game or two #PHIvNY

timelineItems.name: Alexis
timelineItems.text: @philaunion v. @newyorkredbulls #doop #philly #nofilter #union #NYRB

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Fred (Philadelphia Union) left footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Danny Cruz.
Foul by Jamison Olave (New York Red Bulls).
Danny Cruz (Philadelphia Union) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Rob G
timelineItems.text: #rbny continues to drop points in conference. Pretty soon it won't matter how good we play...

timelineItems.name: Manav Khandelwal
timelineItems.text: #Union with a HUGE win tonight against a big rival, 3-1 over the Red Bulls. Playoff hopes look brighter than they did Saturday night. #DOOP

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Philadelphia Union 3, New York Red Bulls 1.
